briefTitle: Omega-3 Fatty Acids and Chemotherapy-induced Neuropathy and Inflammation in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: The Effects of Omega-3 Fatty Acids on Chemotherapy-induced Neuropathy and Inflammation in Patients With Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The EMG-NCV test,The serum level of IL-1,IL-6,TNF-alpha and hs-CRP
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Suffering from invasive breast cancer,not receiving any form of supplementations and oil fish

Exclusion Criteria:

* Suffering from the diseases leading to neuropathy, e.g.diabetes, hyperthyroidism, AIDS and primary neural diseases
* Suffering from any other kind of malignancies
* Receiving any chemotherapeutical agents in the past
